QuestData.Title: Honoring a Hero
QuestData.Description: By the Light...$B$BI can't believe this happened to Taylor and his men when they had a full garrison.$B$BIt's going to take everything we have to keep your outpost safe, commander.$B$BWe should get out of here. We can honor the fallen when we're safe.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Lieutenant Willem at Southport.
QuestData.RewardText: We will never forget Admiral Taylor's sacrifices for the greater good.
